author: Ben Kew, Ben Kew
title: Report: China Hasn't Paid Migrant Workers Who Built Wuhan Propaganda Hospitals
description: Migrant workers in Wuhan, China, who built the hospitals prominently featured in Beijing's coronavirus propaganda videos have not yet received their full salaries despite the Communist Party claiming the city's outbreak is over, Radio Free Asia (RFA) reported…
content: Migrant workers in Wuhan, China, who built the hospitals prominently featured in Beijing’s coronavirus propaganda videos have not yet received their full salaries despite the Communist Party claiming the city’s outbreak is over, Radio Free Asia (RFA) reported… [+2482 chars]
